product_name: The North Face Toasty Toes Insulated Bunting - Infant Boys'
long_description: The North Face Toasty Toes bunting snuggles baby boys in an insulated and quilted layer with fold-over mittens and booties for protection from the cold. Waterproof, windproof, breathable and fully seam-sealed shell creates an effective barrier against rain and snow. Quilted body is insulated with Heatseeker(TM) Aero polyester fibers. The North Face Toasty Toes bunting has an asymmetric front zipper for easy dressing and diaper changes. Fold-over mittens and booties keep little hands and feet warm; hood warms baby's head and ears.
short_description: The North Face Toasty Toes bunting snuggles baby boys in an insulated and quilted layer with fold-over mittens and booties for protection from the cold.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
